text: Michael Lynn Evans III (born August 21, 1993) is an American football wide receiver for the Tampa Bay Buccaneers of the National Football League (NFL). Evans played college football at Texas A&M.; He was drafted by the Tampa Bay Buccaneers in the first round with the seventh overall pick in the 2014 NFL Draft. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Tampa Bay Buccaneers bio *Texas A&M; Aggies bio Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:American football wide receivers Category:Texas A&M; Aggies football players Category:Tampa Bay Buccaneers players
title: Mike Evans (wide receiver)
